title: Bug 114903: Default values not displayed in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the expected behavior is that the default values should be displayed in the value box, allowing the user to modify the specific parameter they want to change. However, the actual behavior is that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty. This requires the user to input all values instead of just modifying the desired parameter.
OB: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, all values in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog are empty.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values should be shown in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, allowing the user to modify the parameter they want to change.
SR:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Verify that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty instead of showing the default values.
4. Attempt to modify a parameter and notice that you have to input all values instead of just modifying the desired parameter.
